Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa No. 15140" appears on the left bottom side border. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says France will become miserable if she is allowed to take part in Bolshevism.  The three elements of the production are work, intelligence and capital. Illustration shows an explosion in a large container which is marked work, intelligence and capital. A man with a torch is seen running away from the explosion after he set it.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: La France irait à la misère
